ygData.subject: Travelling to Lower Guk to get a Guise
ygData.msgSnippet: Yesterday Kitasi and I discussed going to Lower Guk and purchasing the looting rights from a group that was camping the spawn that drops the Guise of the
ygData.messageBody:
Yesterday Kitasi and I discussed going to Lower Guk and purchasing the
looting rights from a group that was camping the spawn that drops the Guise
of the Deceiver. To recap, I have never killed a live froglok so they are
not KOS towards me. In theory, that combined with the invis song will allow
me to go through Upper Guk safely. However, once I get into Lower Guk the
undead frogloks will still attack me. I discussed my plan with my
guildmembers last night and some of them told me that even with Invis to
Undead, my chances of safely going to Lower Guk to loot a Guise were not
good. I was told told that the undead frogloks can sometimes see through
Invis to Undead.

Can someone familiar with Lower Guk give me some advice with this plan? I
do not intend to attack anything while in Lower Guk. As soon as I enter the
zone, I will announce that I would like to purchase looting rights for the
Guise. Until I get a positive response, I will stay by the zone border.
Once I get a positive response, I will get invis to undead cast on me. Once
I loot and pay for the Guise, I'm leaving Lower Guk. How far away is the
spawn point for the Guise from the zone border? can someone give me the
directions I should take? Invis to undead doesn't last very long so thats a
big factor. Would I have time to run back to the zone border if attacked
while looting?

Lastly, how much should I offer for the looting rights? I was planning on
starting at 50PP and bartering from there. I can spend up to 300PP but
obviously would like to get it as cheap as possible.

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci
24 bard
